attributes.action: Stop the ban over reporting events in Afghanistan by the media
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that in a free and democratic society the Government must not abuse its powers by censoring the reporting of events in Afghanistan for what appears to be nothing more than attempt to avoid any poor headlines in the run up to an election.

rejection.details: This petition presents opinion as fact.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
